mapper.sql: content_id, content_type_id, title, addr1, first_image, first_image2, read_count, sido_code, gugun_code, latitude, longitude
mapper.select: select from sido where sido_name like concat('%', #{sidoName}, '%')
select gugun_code, gugun_name from gugun where sido_code = #{sidoCode}

select d.content_id as `content_id`, i.content_type_id as `content_type_id`, i.title as `title`, i.addr1 as `addr1`, i.first_image as `first_image`, i.first_image2 as `first_image2`, i.read_count as `read_count`, i.sido_code as `sido_code`, i.gugun_code as `gugun_code`, i.latitude as `latitude`, i.longitude as `longitude`, d.overview as `overview` from attraction_description d join attraction_info i using (content_id) where content_id = #{contentId}

select d.content_id as `content_id`, i.content_type_id as `content_type_id`, i.title as `title`, i.addr1 as `addr1`, i.first_image as `first_image`, i.first_image2 as `first_image2`, i.read_count as `read_count`, i.sido_code as `sido_code`, i.gugun_code as `gugun_code`, i.latitude as `latitude`, i.longitude as `longitude`, d.overview as `overview` from attraction_description d join attraction_info i using (content_id)
